description: Rear gardenDescription for the council for works required on Lime x 4 (Tilia spp) These previously reduced trees over hanging several gardens, have outgrown their location and have missed maintenance cycle as a result. They are severely blocking light from several gardens and properties and have recently shed several branches, The following works are to improve light, make safer and slow root expansion as per the below.Rear gardenT1 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp) Height 16m and 5m wide. Suggested works:- Reduce height to previous reduction points approx. 2m leaving furnishing growth - Reduce laterally to previous reduction points approx. 1m leaving furnishing growth.- Leave crown with a natural outline and an approx. size of 14m high and 4m wide treeRear gardenT2 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp) Height 19m and 6m wide. Suggested works- Reduce height to previous reduction points  approx. 4-5m leaving furnishing growth- Reduce laterally to previous reduction points approx. 2m leaving furnishing growth.- Leave crown with a natural outline and an approx. size of 14m high and 4m wide treeRear gardenT3 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp) Height 18m and 6m wide. Suggested works:- Reduce height to previous reduction points approx. 3-4m leaving furnishing growth - Reduce laterally to previous reduction points approx. 2m leaving furnishing growth.- Leave crown with a natural outline and an approx. size of 14m high and 4m wide treeRear gardenT4 Lime x 1(Tilia spp) Height 14m and 4m wide. Suggested works:- Reduce height to previous reduction points approx. 1-2m leaving furnishing growth - Reduce laterally to previous reduction points approx. 1m leaving furnishing growth.- Leave crown with a natural outline and an approx. size of 13m high and 3- 4m wide tree
